document.full_text: small stirrings of the heart and mind evoke delicate musical responses in 'a minister's wife,' a chamber musical based on 'candida,' george bernard shaw's comedy about the mysteries of marital love.
document.title: theater review | 'a minister's wife': three hearts butt heads in one marriage
lines_and_colors: small stirrings of the heart and mind evoke delicate musical responses in 'a minister's wife,' a chamber musical based on 'candida,' george bernard shaw's comedy about the mysteries of marital love.
